score.title: Not dead yet!
paragraphs: There's a house on Little Point, a retirement home where the inhabitants can watch the sun set over the horizon and reflect on passing glories and the end of their lives. It's a lovely little place, with helpful staff, immaculate conditions and the company of many old souls like yourself who've experienced a wealth of years.

Yet some of you aren't happy with your lot. You're not too old to be left waiting for the grave just yet. Something stirs inside you, the passion for one last scheme to take the edge off the monotony of day to day life in the retirement home. And maybe, just maybe, you can get out of here once and for all.

Note: Because the old timers don't get around much, Locations have been replaced by 'Memories', events from their past that have an impact on the present, with the arrival of a person or item, or the desire to avenge a past wrong or make up for old mistakes.
